title: Venetian blind font
content: [A font created from Venetian blinds](http://web.archive.org/web/20130215013714/http:/www.apartmenttherapy.com/andrew-byroms-venetian-blind-t-101315) by Andrew Byrom.
author: Chris Dean

comments.content: I like the rounded bottoms, but the tops look like he cut the blinds apart.

The link you attached is no longer available. Was it all about blind cleaning? Well you can ask for assistance in [Wood blinds orange county](http://web.archive.org/web/20130215013714/http:/www.ocblindcleaners.com/ "Wood blinds orange county"), just contact the administrator.
